org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front
Class WebApplicationExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front.WebApplicationExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException>
@Provider
public class WebApplicationExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException>

Jersey Exception handler to set the WWW-Authenticate header when receiving a FORBIDDEN exception (insufficient rights).

Used to handler Jersey own's exception raised when the JSR-250 annotations are parsed and failed on security issues.
